content: la vonne knot just knits gwen s love designed by angela best pattern notes one size adult s/m worked as is the pattern can however be made larger by using thicker yarns and a larger hook following the same pattern i do suggest you swatch by working a motif for measurements motif row 1 and 2 create the full back to armhole opening which are joined as you go along materials used knit picks paint you own 100% merino lace weight yarn 100 grams 880 yds per skein approx 1000 yards used for shawl e/3 5mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge gauge motif measures 5 across from petal edge to petal edge stitches used chain slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet stitch guide 1st treble_crochet vst work a treble_crochet in single_crochet between motifs chain 8 treble_crochet in same single_crochet as last treble_crochet 2nd treble_crochet vst leaving last loop on hook loosely work a treble_crochet 8 single_crochet over from join work second treble_crochet 8 single_crochet over from first treble_crochet finishing all loops on hook diagram 1 diagram 2 joining center motif 1 2 3 4 center motif chain 8 join with slip_stitch chain 1 row 1 work 16 single_crochet in chain 8 space join to 1st single_crochet row 2 chain 6 counts as double_crochet chain 3 * skip next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 3* repeat around join to 3rd chain of beg chain 6 row 3 chain 4 counts as 1st treble_crochet work 3 treble_crochet in same chain 3 space chain 7 * work 4 treble_crochet in next chain 3 space chain 7 * repeat around and join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 4 row 4 chain 3 single_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet of row 3 s 4tr * in next chain 7 loop work 8dc chain 1 8dc single_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet of row 3 s 4 treble_crochet * fasten_off use a pin or colored yarn to mark this motif as it makes it easier to recognize as the center motif r2 motif work row 1-3 of the center motif row 4 chain 3 single_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet of row 3 s 4tr * in next chain 7 loop work 8 double_crochet single_crochet in chain 1 space between double_crochet of center motif row 4 on petal 1 returning to r2 motif work 8 more double_crochet in chain 7 loop * repeat once more for petal 2 finish motif as for center motif r3 motif work row 1-3 of the center motif row 4 chain 3 single_crochet in 2nd treble_crochet of row 3 s 4tr * in next chain 7 loop work 8 double_crochet single_crochet in petal before the single_crochet join finish petal as before work first 8dc of next petal single_crochet in the single_crochet join finish petal work first 8 double_crochet of next petal join to petal after single_crochet join on center motif finish motif as for center motif 2 continue repeating the r3 motif until you have 7 motifs worked around the center motif then continue
